quest.name: Scattered Scions
journal: The teary-eyed private appears ready to explain the fate of your fellow Scions.

* This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to the serpent lieutenant in Little Solace.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.

You find Papalymo waiting for you at the Goldleaf Dais. Before you can exchange more than a few words with him, however, a fearsome denizen of the forest crashes into view, and you are forced to defend yourself. Needless to say, you have faced worse, and the creature is soon subdued. With the coast apparently clear, resume your conversation with Papalymo.
You speak with Papalymo, but find his manner to be oddly stilted. Plainly, he is not quite himself. Return to Maxio and share your suspicions.

Maxio believes that the touched sylphs are using an enchantment to disguise themselves as your fellow Scions. Accordingly, he provides you with scalebombs that will nullify their illusory magicks. Throw the trueform scalebombs at Papalymo and Yda's doubles, and defeat the devious dissemblers.
You have defeated the touched sylphs who were masquerading as Yda and Papalymo. Report your success to Maxio.
Your sylphic guide suggests continuing the search for your comrades elsewhere. It seems you have no choice but to press on into the Sylphlands.
You locate Yda and Thancred, but have no way of knowing if they are who they seem to be...save one. Make use of the trueform scalebombs given to you by Maxio, and defeat any tricksters you reveal.

Though your scalebombs have no effect on Yda─besides affront and discomfort─they do serve to unmask the sylph posing as Thancred. With the impostor out of the way, you may now speak freely with your fellow Scion.

It would seem that Yda had no inkling of the touched sylph's deception, nor does she know where the real Thancred might be. Give the exasperated pugilist a moment to think before discussing how best to proceed.
objectives: * This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to the serpent lieutenant in Little Solace.

dialogue.name: MAXIO
dialogue.text: Coughing and crying ones seem much recovered. Will walking one speak with arrow-shooting ones now?

dialogue.name: MODAE01449
dialogue.text: The sylphs win this round, but I shall be prepared the next time they attempt this trick!

dialogue.name: SEKI01449
dialogue.text: <cough> 'Tis naught but a tickle in my throat now. I am ready to continue.

dialogue.name: NAMIDA01449
dialogue.text: As you are aware, our party fell victim to an ambush.

dialogue.name: NAMIDA01449
dialogue.text: We scouts immediately moved forward to engage the enemy, and bid the Scions to take cover. Then, before we knew what was happening, the air was filled with that stinging, choking dust.

dialogue.name: NAMIDA01449
dialogue.text: The last thing I saw before my vision clouded was Master Papalymo stumbling northeast, towards the Goldleaf Dais.

dialogue.name: NAMIDA01449
dialogue.text: I know not what befell the others. The touched sylphs are certainly alerted to our presence in their territory, and I urge you to locate your companions quickly. Maxio, our guide, will be of the greatest help to you in that endeavor.

dialogue.name: NAMIDA01449
dialogue.text: Meanwhile, my fellow scouts and I will seek to draw the attention of potential ambushers away from you. Their nasty tricks will not find us such easy prey a second time!

dialogue.name: MAXIO
dialogue.text: I have found walking one's companions! Wise ones will be happy to see walking one!

dialogue.name: DUMMYYDAO01450
dialogue.text: No! I will not walk another step! Let us cease this despoilment of the forest and return home!

dialogue.name: DUMMYPAPALYMO01450
dialogue.text: Enough of this! My feet ache, my back hurts, and I wish to leave these sylphs in peace!

dialogue.name: DUMMYPAPALYMO01450
dialogue.text: Hm? Aetheric readings? Why don't you let this fellow take your measure!

dialogue.name: DUMMYPAPALYMO01450
dialogue.text: Why are we still here? I tire, and wish to depart immediately. My companion feels the same way!

dialogue.name: DUMMYPAPALYMO01450
dialogue.text: <sigh> Why do you persist? There is no need to take “measurements.” I can tell you with certainty that Lord Ramuh is nowhere to be found!

dialogue.name: MAXIO
dialogue.text: Is something bothering walking one? Wise ones are not acting as wise ones should?

dialogue.name: MAXIO
dialogue.text: Hmmm... This one is not sure how wise ones should behave, but this one suspects sneaky ones seek to deceive walking one with skin-changing tricks!

dialogue.name: MAXIO
dialogue.text: Walking one must take these trick-breaking scalebombs and throw them at skin-changing sneaky ones. ...Although, this one does not suggest throwing anything unless walking one is sure wise ones are not truly wise ones!

dialogue.name: MAXIO
dialogue.text: Throw the trick-breaking scalebombs at strangely acting wise ones. Walking one will soon discover if wise ones were sneaky ones after all!

dialogue.name: MAXIO
dialogue.text: Hm? Wise ones were sneaky ones in disguise after all? So this one led walking one into sneaky ones' trap...? Forgive this one. This one will search some more, and so must walking one.

dialogue.name: MAXIO
dialogue.text: Does walking one still have trick-breaking scalebombs? This one fears more sneaky ones may be lurking nearby...

dialogue.name: MAXIO
dialogue.text: This one spies more wise ones! Perhaps even real wise ones!

dialogue.name: DUMMYTHANCRED01450
dialogue.text: Oh, woe is me! I cannot go on! It is far too dangerous! What if something were to happen to my beautiful faaace!?

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text:
Forename! It's you!
I was worried you wouldn't find us.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Seeing as you have, though─do you think you could give me a hand? Thancred's being a bit...difficult. I keep telling him we should be taking readings, but he refuses to move.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: I really don't know what Thancred's so worried about. His face isn't that beautiful.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: <cough> <cough> Ugh! What did you do that for!?

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: <cough> <cough> That was just mean...

dialogue.name: MAXIO
dialogue.text: Coughing one is true wise one! Walking one may want to apologize...

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Thancred turned into a sylph!? ...No? Waaait...you're telling me that was a sylph all along!?

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Ugh! I can't believe I fell for that! I'd heard about the shape-shifting trick, but that sprite was just so convincing... Hmm... I wonder where the real Thancred has disappeared to?

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You sense a hostile presence!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: How did walking one know!?

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Walking one ruined this one's trick!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: But...this one's disguise was perfect!

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）
